modal.descImport: This client <bold>already has</bold> a Baby Book account. So <bold>we don't need a voucher</bold>. Upon completion, we generate an <bold>import link</bold>: ‚Ä¢ if the client imports to a <bold>child with access</bold>, there is no charge; ‚Ä¢ if the client creates a <bold>new Baby Book</bold>, <bold>1 credit</bold> will be consumed.
modal.descVoucher: This will <bold>reserve 1 credit</bold> (in transit). Upon redemption: ‚Ä¢ if the client creates a <bold>new Baby Book</bold>, the credit becomes <bold>CONSUMED</bold>; ‚Ä¢ if the client links to an <bold>existing baby</bold>, the credit becomes <bold>REFUNDED</bold> (automatic refund). The voucher will be unique to this delivery.

help.title: Help Center
help.footer: Made with love to register life's most precious moments.

questions.addChild: How do I add a new child?
questions.addChildAnswer: In the side menu, click the 'Register child' button or go to 'Child Profile' > 'Add'. You can register multiple children and easily switch between them.
questions.shareFamily: How do I share moments with family?
questions.shareFamilyAnswer: In each moment, click the share icon. You can generate a unique link to share or invite guardians directly by email.
questions.securityAnswer: Yes! We use end-to-end encryption and secure cloud storage. Only you and the people you authorize can see the memories.
questions.guestbookAnswer: The Guestbook allows family and friends to leave loving messages. You control if messages need approval before appearing.
questions.exportAnswer: Yes! In the Vault, you can download all your photos and documents at any time. Your data belongs to you.

states.errorDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or reload the page.
